title: v1.6.3.4 Quick Tab Bug Fixes
details:
v1.6.3.4 implemented fixes for all 10 issues from the Quick Tabs Multi-Issue Report:

1. Issue 1: Added state hydration from storage via _hydrateStateFromStorage() in index.js
2. Issue 2: DOM/Map cleanup with proper isRendered() live DOM checks
3. Issue 3: Z-index persistence added to storage-utils.js and UpdateHandler hash
4. Issue 4: UI close button now routes through DestroyHandler with proper storage persistence
5. Issue 5: Explicit Map deletion logging with wasInMap flag
6. Issue 6: Source parameter added to all handler methods (UI, Manager, automation, background)
7. Issue 7: Enhanced DestroyHandler logging with source indication
8. Issue 8: WARNING log when hydration is skipped

Key patterns:
- All handler methods now accept source parameter with default 'unknown'
- Events include source in payload for tracing
- Storage hydration happens in _initStep6_Hydrate() during initialization
- Minimized tabs are hydrated to minimizedManager without DOM rendering
